phrases: Did not Manato come here sometimes?
I will be careful from now on.
Damn, what is up with this girl?
And fifty coppers for the grave.
How much longer are you guys going to stay here?
I do not know what to do in this situation.
And it is finally sinking in...
I do not really want to drink.
Is not he was coming here sometimes?
I am seriously cannot take this anymore.
I am not doing this because I want to.
It is the same for you guys, right?
Who cares about being a Warrior, a Thief, a Dark Knight, or a Priest?
I am done, I am done.
I am done with all of this.
What are you going to do then?
We all came this far as Volunteer Soldiers, because there was no other choice.
And who the heck decided that for us?
There is nothing else we can do!
Yeah, we need to work as Volunteer Soldiers, but how are we supposed to?
You think I do not get that?!
How are we supposed to keep going without him, huh?!
You were the one who made him use too much magic and put us in this mess.
Ranta, is that how you see
You are saying that is not it, huh?!
This is not the time to be fighting!
We should not be fighting amongst ourselves.
Wait, you should not be talking
I will be careful from now on, for real.
I see he is a scary one when he gets mad.
We do need to think about what our next steps will be...
I was not saying all that earlier in a fit of despair.
After thinking about it, I basically realized that we cannot go on without him.
It costs money just to eat and sleep.
Maybe I will look for another job.
I thought that you could not quit from the Dark Knight guild.
Hey, how have you guys been?
I heard you guys from over there.
I do not see him here today though.
Manatocchi seemed like someone you could depend on.
I am in this guy Tokimune's ty-par.
You want me to introduce you guys?
Priests do have a high fatality rate.
Enemies know Priests are healers, too.
I just have to protect my Priest no matter what.
It is usually like that, you know.
He was always the one... saving me.
See here, the only thing you can do now is think about what you are going to do.
We do not have to listen to what Kikkawa says, but what would Manato have done?
It is fine, it is fine.
You can just see if there are any Trainee Volunteer Soldiers Priests who want to join your party.
By the way, I am not a trainee anymore.
You want to see my badge?
There are not any Priests who would want to join our party.
Despite my personality, I know a lot of people.
I thought I would remember them eventually while we talked.
And this is Merry-san, a Priest!
Then, why do not you go.
Hey, do something about your attitude or the way you talk.
Uh, I do not mind, though.
I hope I did not offend you.
Then say something to Merry yourself.
Haruhiro, are you pushing things you do not want to do onto other people, hm?
Merry was just the type of Priest Kikkawa had described her as.
Why do I have to go fight the goblins?
I will not go to the front lines.
I am a Priest, so it should be obvious why.
I cannot believe I have to be so polite, Merry
Anyway, is that staff just for show?
You are now, you are so, this, how to say...
I will do just that without you telling me.
Damn, what is up with her?
Can you clean up your language a little?
Why do not you just plug your ears if you dislike it that much?
Why do I need to do something so bothersome?
She does not make you mad?
They are probably wondering what we were thinking when we invited a new Priest to the group right after Manato died.
Especially when it is somebody like her.
We did not even ask Yume and Shihoru.
I am sure that Manato would not have done something like this on a whim.
It is not a wound we need to heal immediately.
If it were Manato and not me in charge, we could have easily beat the goblins of that level.
Manato was a defensive tank on par with Moguzo, a healer, our strategist, and our leader.
I know what you are going to say, Haruhiro.
Our goal for now is to buy our official badges to become a full-fledged Volunteer Soldiers.
But it does not really feel like it matters anymore.
That is what you are thinking, right?
I have mixed feelings about you knowing what I am thinking.
I do feel that we have lost sight of our goal.
I cannot believe things could change so much, just because he is not here anymore.
Do not make it sound so insignificant.
It throws me off when you apologize so quickly.
And he started as a Volunteer Soldier at the same time as us.
A gold is worth a hundred silvers!
We could easily buy our official badges with that.
I-I do not think Manato would be happy if we bought our badges with that money.
We have not even properly talked to Yume or Shihoru.
It was not like this before.
So we just have to all get along?
I do not know, but if it were Manato...
Did you do something that would make me angry?
I invited Merry into our party... without asking you or Shihoru.
I did not think we could go on without a Priest...
That is not it at all.
That is not it at all!
That is why me and Shihoru are like this!
Yeah, I do not get it.
I will not get it if you do not tell me.
I am bad at sharing how I feel.
And Shihoru cannot even talk to you guys properly!
I am too... not good with words either...
And that is the same for all of us.
It is not just one person's fault.
It is not just your fault, right?
The six of us were all friends.
Am I the only one who thought that?
Have I been wrong this whole time?
I was the one who was wrong.
It is true that Manato was our leader, but he did not do everything by himself.
The six of us together did things that Manato could not have done by himself.
I was just thinking what a good party we have become.
Ranta, Moguzo, and I just shut you two out.
You and Shihoru must have been lonely.
I was sad, and Shihoru probably was, too.
I just discovered that it is super calming when you hold me tight like this.
I will try my best to get along with Merry-chan.
Our current situation could be easily misinterpreted.
No, it would be impossible not to get the wrong idea here.
I did not see anything until now!
It is not what it looks like!
the dry air after a rain,
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
Crying Does not Mean You are Weak.
Enduring Does not Mean You are Strong.
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
